name: Obsidian Soul
description:
Obsidian Soul is a 2D platformer game made for PC and Laptop gameplay. This is a simple game with easy to control mechanics and increasing difficulty game. It has a backstory, although the backstory has yet to be determined in the game. 

In a kingdom a princess holds the heart of  obsidian. The kingdom is peaceful and harmonious. Then an evil fire demon called Lucifer comes and takes the heart from the princess and defeats her; he takes droplet hostages and takes the fireballs as allies. When the princess awoke she found 1 droplet left, he explained what had happened so the princess had one clear goal, to collect all of the droplets who have been captured; defeat Lucifer and retrieve the heart of obsidian to bring peace back to the kingdom.

Hope You Enjoy
